title: ICT-Integrated Science Project Design: Short-Term Intensive Course Utilizing a Constructivist Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theory and basic ICT proficiency (smartphone app usage, experience with online collaboration tools)
context.additional_context: Constructivist project-based learning in a smartphone-centric limited technology environment: Integrated design of ICT tools for team-based scientific problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners can execute science project design processes using smartphone-based ICT tools with over 80% accuracy
Learners can complete collaborative science problem-solving projects through constructivist interactions with team members
Learners can propose at least three criteria for evaluating the educational utility of ICT tools

resources: Low-Spec Online Collaboration Platform (e.g., Google Docs Mobile Version)
Science Experiment Kit (for Simple Model Construction)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
